name: jorisw-mongodb
author: Joris van der Wel <joris@jorisvanderwel.com>
summary: Configures the MongoDB 3 / Percona Server / TokuMX service. Any config setting can be configured using your puppet manifest and/or using hiera.
description: CConfigures the MongoDB 3 / Percona Server / TokuMX service. Any config setting can be configured using your puppet manifest and/or using hiera.
